table.title: SYMBOL OF THE TRUTH
rows: Lying to you about their identity
Lying to you about their intent

ability.name: Punitive Stroke
ability.text: Make a melee Attack against a known liar. Get +[[/r d10]] to the Attack, ignoring armour.

passion.name: Honesty
passion.text: Restore SPI when you tell the truth where a lie might be more beneficial.

property: Polished mace ([[/r d8]] hefty), mail (A1), plate (A1), and helm (A1)
Kite shield ([[/r d4]], A1) marked with a symbol of the truth (see below)
Petulant steed (VIG 10, CLA 10, SPI 5, 5GD)
title: True Knight
poem: A pact to uphold truth and fact
On lies the false lay brake and cracked

seer.title: Rotted Seer
traits: Their withered touch is only contagious if they will it.
Sees the way to live on through any amount of physical decay.
Wants to become even more rotten, filthy, and diseased.

ability.name: Wild Eye
ability.text: Observe a beast in secret. Learn a useful truth about their habitat.

passion.name: Empathy
passion.text: Restore SPI when you spare the life of a hostile animal.

property: Handaxe ([[/r d6]]) attached to wildrope (strong rope that blends perfectly into foliage), gambeson (A1)
Companion (see below) (VIG 5, CLA 10, SPI 7, 4GD, partially understands human speech)
Tattered steed (VIG 8, CLA 10, SPI 5, 2GD)
title: Snare Knight
poem: Immersed within the woods adeep
A sheriff rides from nature's keep

seer.title: Swollen Seer
traits: Can only be moved by feats of engineering usually reserved for siegery.
Sees within the minds of huge beings.
Wants to grow ever bigger.

ability.name: Champion Vow
ability.text: Use immediately before a combat where there is a prize at stake. +[[/r d6]] to melee attacks for the whole combat.

passion.name: Hatred
passion.text: Restore SPI when you refuse a plea for forgiveness.

property: Greatlance ([[/r 2d10]] hefty when mounted, slow on foot) and 2 javelins ([[/r d6]])
Gambeson (A1), arena plate (A1), fancy helm (A1, see below)
Horned stallion (VIG 12, CLA 10, SPI 5, 4GD, [[/r d6]] trample)
title: Tourney Knight
poem: A calling brought a life of combat, victories amassed
Questing for the fame that comes with prowess unsurpassed

seer.title: Entombed Seer
traits: Now entombed in white stone, their voice answers visitors only rarely.
Always guarded by a Knight, mourned by an apprentice.
Sees beyond the veil of death.

ability.name: Slaughter Echo
ability.text: Use immediately after defeating an opponent. Your next melee Attack in this combat gains Blast.

passion.name: Justice
passion.text: Restore SPI when you restore the balance of justice.

property: Longaxe ([[/r d10]] long), mail (A1), brutal plate (A1 only when Wounded), helm (A1)
Sacks of strong alcohol, to which you're largely resistant (see below, restock each new Season)
Bullish warhorse (VIG 15, CLA 5, SPI 5, 3GD, [[/r d6]] trample)
title: Bloody Knight
poem: Some were born to fight and fall, forged beneath blade's clash
This one birthed from blood of war, stained with corpses' ash

seer.title: Reed Seer
traits: Knows they will lose their sight if they pass over a river.
Sees the near future in the patterns of reeds chopped in a very specific way.
Wants to live in the protection of a worthy master, serving a righteous cause.

ability.name: Mosstongue
ability.text: Speak with uncut stones and particularly old trees. If you push them for too much knowledge they rebuke you, shunning you for the rest of the day.

passion.name: Naturality
passion.text: Restore SPI when you reject an opportunity to sleep indoors, sleeping in nature instead.

property: Branch cudgel ([[/r d8]] hefty), buckler ([[/r d4]], A1), mail coif (A1)
Tattoos (see below)
Pale steed (VIG 8, CLA 12, SPI 5, 3GD)
title: Moss Knight
poem: No need for lessons, tree or stone
The wisest seek what soil has shown

seer.title: Loathed Seer
traits: Long, twisted face and body, like she's been pulled around a cart wheel.
Sees into a person's hate with a touch, sharing and fuelling their contempt.
Physically pained by admiration or love. Wants to become even more loathed.

table.title: MILITARY GEAR
rows: +[[/r d10]] vs targets with a shield
+[[/r d10]] vs targets without a shield

ability.name: Battle Awareness
ability.text: When fighting in a combat with at least 3 combatants on each side all your Gambits count as Strong Gambits.

passion.name: Duty
passion.text: Restore SPI when you answer the call for martial service under a superior.

property: Special polearm ([[/r d8]], long, see below), gambeson (A1), splint (A1), helm (A1, see below)
Whalebone chess set (and some skill)
Stocky steed (VIG 15, CLA 8, SPI 5, 2GD)
title: War Knight
poem: Forged and broke in goreful plight
Won some, lost some, still upright

seer.title: Lost Seer
traits: Constantly being rubbed with psychotropic tinctures, parts of their body seeming to dissipate from reality.
Sees things that have been lost in a hazy vision of their current location.
Knows they will lose their sight if they advise directly how to find something.

ability.name: Bend with the Wind
ability.text: When you use a Gambit to Move you count as having Armour 4 until your next turn. This does not stack with your actual armour.

passion.name: Doubt
passion.text: Restore SPI when you defer to somebody more senior than you, even though you disagree.

property: Old sword ([[/r d8]] hefty) and half-shield (A1), gambeson (A1)
Youthful energy (use once only to treat a Mortal Wound as a normal Wound)
Cautious steed (VIG 10, CLA 15, SPI 5, 2GD)
title: Willow Knight
poem: Titans tall, now smithreened stones
The youth, cast down, intact, alone

seer.title: Carved Seer
traits: Requires constant treatment, acolytes tending to their runic flesh carvings.
Sees the outcome of battles in their own healing wounds.
Wants to drive the land toward a climactic war that will bring peace.

ability.name: Martyr-in-Waiting
ability.text: Use as a reaction to being Mortally Wounded. Allies fighting with you regain [[/r d6]]GD and get +[[/r d12]] against your attacker for the combat.

passion.name: Pride
passion.text: Restore SPI when you take personal credit for a great victory.

property: Great mace ([[/r d10]] long)
Gambeson (A1), gold cloaked plate (A1), gold-masked helm (A1, opponents who know the value of gold have their first ever Attack against you
title: Gilded Knight
poem: A beacon of the brave and bold
All cloaked and masked in sunnen gold

seer.title: Enthroned Seer
traits: They are a twisted heap of flesh, bone, and spikes of precious metal.
Sees glimpses of the ultimate fate of anybody taking up a Seat of Power.
Demands a humiliating level of reverence from visitors. Wants to manipulate loyal contacts into positions of authority.

ability.name: Song of the Steed
ability.text: Speak in a voice comprehensible to horses. They need reasoning with, but are inclined to trust you.

passion.name: Certainty
passion.text: Restore SPI when you prove somebody wrong.

property: Beloved steed (VIG 12, CLA 15, SPI 7, 4GD, see below)
Fine saddle and tack (you can never be dismounted)
3 Rider's Axes ([[/r d6]] +[[/r d6]] when mounted, can be thrown), mail (A1) and rider’s plate (A1 when mounted)
title: Saddle Knight
poem: A perfect steed is neither wild nor tamed
As one, a streak aguele through green untamed

seer.title: Jewelled Seer
traits: No body is visible, just layers and layers of jewelled silk and glittering lace.
Can see the history of jewelled items, and the locations of their own jewels.
Wants to send their jewels out to remote places, watching from afar.

ability.name: Layered Words
ability.text: Speak, but choose two different meanings, as different as you wish, even total opposites. Choose which meaning each listener takes from the words.

passion.name: Integrity
passion.text: Restore SPI when you discredit somebody unworthy of their position.

property: Twisted bow ([[/r d6]] long), light mail (A1) with embroidered cloak
Moon pendant (grants the wearer a false form under moonlight, see below, rolling each night)
Shadowy horse (VIG 8, CLA 15, SPI 5, 2GD, very quiet)
title: Riddle Knight
poem: A careful word can rise or fade
Within each ear a truth remade

seer.title: Jawbone Seer
traits: Hunched, pale, huge jawbone grafted onto their own, speaks like a wolf.
Sees with the senses of a beast while clutching an object made from the bone or horn of their species.
Wants to return the land to the beasts.

ability.name: Flockbond
ability.text: See through the eyes of your bird, and learn the local knowledge of any prey it eats.

passion.name: Regret
passion.text: Restore SPI when you burn a part of the past.

property: Hookhammer ([[/r d8]] hefty, +[[/r d8]] dropping from above), shield-gauntlet ([[/r d6]], A1), helm (A1)
Loyal bird (VIG 5, CLA 10, SPI 5, 4GD, [[/r d4]] talons, see below)
Old steed (VIG 8, CLA 8, SPI 7, 2GD)
title: Talon Knight
poem: The claw is nothing without the eye
The eye is nothing without the wing

seer.title: Veiled Seer
traits: Hanging folds of flesh and horse-like hair hide any semblance of a face.
Sees nothing, but hears all within a Hex. Speaks just once each day, giving a single word of advice to the most worthy visitor.
Genuinely wants to uphold peace.

ability.name: The Red Hunt
ability.text: Infuse a target’s blood into an arrow to give it +[[/r d12]] against the target. You can also taste a small amount of the blood to get a glimpse of their location.

passion.name: Apathy
passion.text: Restore SPI when you reject a call for comfort.

property: Jagged spear ([[/r d8]] hefty, +[[/r d8]] against a target you have Wounded or Scarred), red cloaked mail (A1)
Hunting bow ([[/r d6]] long)
Vicious charger (VIG 12, CLA 8, SPI 5, 3GD, [[/r d6]] trample)
title: Barbed Knight
poem: Stone and spikes split into flowers
Cruelty is delicious power

seer.title: Serpent Seer
traits: A writhing pile of serpents, speaking as one through a choir of hisses.
Grants visions of dangerous beasts in the wilderness nearby.
Wants more unusual serpents for their pile, or even just a snack.
